name: Order of the Lycan
source: Critical Role / Explorer's Guide to Wildemount
description: Members of the Order of the Lycan undergo a controlled curse that allows them to assume a hybrid form, gaining feral power while struggling to maintain control over their inner beast.

3.name: Heightened Senses
3.description: You gain advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

3.name: Hybrid Transformation
3.description: As a bonus action, you can transform into a hybrid lycanthropic form for a limited duration, gaining natural weapons and enhanced physical abilities.

7.description: While in your hybrid form, your movement speed increases and you can move along vertical surfaces and across liquids without falling.

11.name: Advanced Transformation
11.description: Your hybrid form improves, granting increased damage, resilience, and greater control over your feral instincts.

15.name: Brand of the Lycan
15.description: Your Brand of Castigation deals additional damage and imposes disadvantage on attacks made by the branded creature while you are in hybrid form.

18.name: Blood Curse of the Exiled
18.description: You gain a powerful blood curse that allows you to suppress or exploit lycanthropic transformations in others.
